about.description: A recent Master's graduate in Telecommunications Engineering, I'm a versatile professional with a strong foundation in electronics, AI, and data science. I have hands-on experience in both front-end and back-end web development using React, Vue.js, and Node.js, allowing me to build comprehensive projects from start to finish. I'm skilled in leveraging my technical expertise to solve problems and am passionate about developing solutions that sit at the intersection of engineering and technology.

items.title: Full-Stack Web Development
items.description: Designing, developing, and deploying modern web applications. Proficient in front-end frameworks like **React** and **Vue.js**, with a strong command of back-end technologies using **Node.js**.

items.title: Data Science & AI
items.description: Transforming complex datasets into actionable insights using **Python** and its ecosystem of libraries. Experienced in **data engineering** pipelines, machine learning, and creating interactive **data visualizations**.

items.title: Telecommunications & Electronics Engineering
items.description: Applying a foundational understanding of telecommunications and electronics principles to real-world problems. Skilled in signal processing, network analysis, and system design.

items.title: 3D Modeling & Simulation
items.description: Creating and simulating 3D models of antennas and electromagnetic components for engineering analysis using **CST Studio Suite**.

items.title: Technical Communication
items.description: Effectively communicating complex technical concepts and project outcomes through professional-grade reports and presentations. Experienced with tools like **Overleaf (LaTeX)** for academic writing and **PowerPoint** for visual presentations.

portfolio_1.title: Random Quote Generator
portfolio_1.description: It is a simple web application that displays random quotes to users.
portfolio_1.caption: The Demo

portfolio_1.title: Choropleth Map
portfolio_1.description: This project aims to visualize the population distribution in Algeria using a choropleth map.
portfolio_1.caption: The Demo

portfolio_1.title: Heatmap
portfolio_1.description: This project aims to create a heatmap that visualizes the distribution of a specific disease before and after the introduction of a vaccine.
portfolio_1.caption: The Demo

portfolio_1.title: ScatterPlot
portfolio_1.description: the Iris dataset, comprises 150 samples of iris flowers, each characterized by four features.
portfolio_1.caption: The Demo

portfolio_1.title: Interactive Legend Bar Chart
portfolio_1.description: This project aims to create a bar chart that visualizes the distribution of different religions in various countries.
portfolio_1.caption: The Demo

portfolio_1.title: Basic Calculator using JavaScript
portfolio_1.description: This project aims to create a basic calculator using JavaScript, a popular programming language for web development.
